scripts.build: concurrently 'yarn --cwd coyou-app/ run build' 'yarn --cwd api/ run build' 'yarn --cwd models/ run build'
scripts.build:w: concurrently 'yarn --cwd coyou-app/ run build:w' 'yarn --cwd api/ run build:w' 'yarn --cwd models/ run build:w'
scripts.test: concurrently 'yarn --cwd coyou-app/ test' 'yarn --cwd api/ test' 'yarn --cwd models/ test'
scripts.test:w: concurrently 'yarn --cwd coyou-app/ run test:w' 'yarn --cwd api/ run test:w' 'yarn --cwd models/ run test:w'
scripts.postinstall: concurrently 'yarn --cwd coyou-app/ install' 'yarn --cwd api/ install' 'yarn --cwd models/ install'
